name: HedgeCo Websites
tag_list: hedge-fund, website-development, website-design, logo-design, marketing-material, stationary, business-card, web-hosting, domain-name-registration, tech-support
overview: HedgeCo’s combination of expert hedge fund consultants, talented creative designers and top-quality website programmers collaborate exceptionally well to produce high quality hedge fund websites. The websites are developed under SEC guidelines and offer hedge-fund-specific functionality. Custom solutions for website development, logo design, marketing material, and stationary services are offered to fit each firms needs. All websites are in-house made so the firm can take control and make updates at their discretion. The website development process consists of project specifications, contract and initial payment, design, implementation, training and data entry, and delivery of final product. Website packages include foundation, advanced and suite, which consist of different services and provisions. Clients can be assisted when necessary with full service support for the first year at no additional cost. HedgeCo’s creation process is efficient and projects are always at the utmost quality.
